# CategoryLocale

SDL locale services.

This provides a way to get a list of preferred locales (language plus
country) for the user. There is exactly one function:
[SDL_GetPreferredLocales](SDL_GetPreferredLocales)(), which handles all the
heavy lifting, and offers documentation on all the strange ways humans
might have configured their language settings.

<!-- END CATEGORY DOCUMENTATION -->
